code: export function logout(){localStorage.removeItem('refreshToken');sessionStorage.removeItem('accessToken');sessionStorage.removeItem('user');window.location.href='/login';}export function getAccessToken(){return localStorage.getItem('accessToken')||sessionStorage.getItem('accessToken');}export function isLoggedIn(){return!!getAccessToken();}export function getUser(){const stored=sessionStorage.getItem("user");if(stored){return JSON.parse(stored);}else{window.location.href='/';}}
